goals.description: You feel very - about Bride's Father. Do something about it

players.secret: Hooked up with my Best Man at the Bachelor party.
players.information: Drunk Uncle gave me a huge cash gift before the wedding.
players.blurb: Last Night: It was your bachelor party. Best Man, Drunk Uncle, Wedding Planner, Bride’s Father, Dog was there. You were grabbed from your bed, black bagged and taken on a 8 hour pub crawl. You had to drink everytime anyone else did and got pretty blasted. Bride's Father left at some point, you think he was worse than you. You all went to a hotel, and were told there would be some 'friends' coming voer soon by your Drunk Uncle. They never rocked up, and as you sat talking to your Best Man you realised that you hadn't experienced all there was in the single life yet. The sex was fantastic. You still love your bride and want to get married.
players.title: Groom

powers.name: Other People
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

powers.name: Attack
powers.description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player is knocked out.

powers.name: Defend
powers.description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

players.information: Maid of Honor got hammered last night.
players.blurb: Last Night: It was your Bachelorette party. You asked for a night in of party games & Rom Coms but the Maid of Honor had other plans. She and the Groom's Mother rocked up, drunk as skunks. You went to a Casino, Pole Dancing and then did donuts in a local parking lot. The Maid of Honor puked over your favourite party dress and you yelled at her for ruining your bachelorette party.
players.title: Bride

players.secret: During cop academy you became an alcoholic.
players.information: You heard the ring came from the Drunk Uncle.
players.blurb: Last Night: You attended the Bachorette party. You had planned for it to be a night in of party games and romcoms, but the Groom’s Mother had other ideas. She brought a bunch of the nicer boxed wine over beforehand and you pre-gamed a little too hard. The rest of the night was a blur. You vaguely recall a casino and getting donuts. You have a massive headache and have vowed to never drink again. After the wedding.
players.title: Maid of Honor

players.secret: I run the entire town's drug trade.
players.information: I saw the Maid of Honor trying on the wedding ring at the bachelorette party.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were too young to be there, but someone had to make it a real party. You gave the Maid of Honor a small dose of Ketamine and she took it hard. Oops. You werent allowed in the Casino, so you left and made a few sales.
players.title: Flowergirl

players.secret: The hooker's never showed up to the hotel last night.
players.information: The Groom's Mother recovered from last night better than anyone else.
players.blurb: Last night: You were at the Bachelor party. You kidnapped the Groom and brought him on the greatest pub crawl of all time. You went light on the drinks because you wanted to be sharp for your best friend’s wedding the next day. After the last bar you all went back to a hotel and you and the Groom and you split a room. One thing led to another and you both boned down. Hard. It was something you had always thought about, but didn’t think would ever happen. Everyone thinks you got hookers for the night, and you’ve decided to let everything think that.
players.title: Best Man

players.secret: You have a serious drug problem.
players.information: The Groom's mother tried to get a prenup signed but the Groom blocked it.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were at the Bachelor party. You kidnapped the Groom and brought him on a pretty nice pub crawl. You managed to get quite turped up. Plus you found your dealer and scored some Ketamine. Rest of the night is pretty blurry but at one point everyone put you in a taxi to go home. You have woken up with a hangover, and are ready for a bonza wedding.
players.title: Bride's Father

players.information: The Groom's father died in drag race 2 years ago.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were at the Bachelor party. You wanted to treat everyone so you paid for drinks on the pub crawl the whole night and also the hotel afterwards. You didn’t stay until the end because you got a bit too drunk. You were planning on setting everyone up with hookers at the hotel, but you never got a chance to set it up.

players.secret: Driving late at night you hit someone. It was dark, but you kept on driving...
players.information: You heard there is an off duty cop at the wedding.
players.blurb: Last Night: You were hired to join the Bachelorette party. Strange but they are country folk. You got some great shots, the Maid of Honor was super blasted, and the Flowergirl would not let herself be photographed.
players.title: Photographer
